text: Robert Skotak (born May 17, 1945) and Dennis Skotak (born February 15, 1943) are American filmmakers and visual effects artists, known for their collaborations with director James Cameron. Between them they have won three Academy Awards for Best Visual Effects, for Aliens (1986), The Abyss (1989), and Terminator 2: Judgment Day (1991), in addition to two BAFTA Awards and a Saturn Award.
